The purpose of the patent is to provide a method and apparatus for feeding sheets from a top of a stack of sheets to a sheet processing machine. The stack of sheets is raised by a motor until the top of the stack has reached a predetermined maximum level. At this position, the sheets are fed by a feeding mechanism from the stack to the sheet processing machine to lessen the stack height until the top of the stack has reached a predetermined minimum level as determined by a sensor. The rate at which the stack height is lessened as sheets are fed from the stack is then determined by a controller from the known distance between the predetermined maximum and minimum levels and a value corresponding to the speed at which sheets are fed from the stack. The speed value, or sheet cycle time, may be received from the sheet processing machine, or may be a time duration measured by a timer. The motor is then controllably operated to raise the stack lifting table at a rate corresponding to the rate at which the stack height is lessened, thereby maintaining the top of the stack at substantially the same height as sheets are fed to the sheet processing machine.
